artist: Artist: Vincent D. Smith; Printer: Robert Blackburn Printmaking Workshop, New York; Publisher: G.W. Einstein Company, Inc., New York
creditline: The Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
description: From portfolio of eight etchings with title page, colophon, and cloth-covered clamshell box
inscription:
Title Page inscribed: VINCENT D. SMITH / EIGHT ETCHINGS 1965-1966 / G.W. EINSTEIN COMPANY, INC. / NEW YORK 1994

Colophon inscribed: Eight Etchings by Vincent D. Smith / was printed on Arches paper in 1994 / by Kelly Driscoll at / The Printmaking Workshop / under the supervision of / Robert Blackburn and the artist. / The plates were made by the artist / in 1965 and 1966. A limited number of proofs have been printed by the artist / prior to this edition. / The plates have been canceled. / Forty suites are numbered 1/40 to 40/40 / Ten suites are signed artist\'s proofs / Five suites are signed printer\'s proofs / [signed under text, in pencil]: 30/40 Vincent 94
title: Eight Etchings: The Moon in Harlem
